item.title: Falcon Finance Address Received 10,000,000 USD1
item.description: On August 28th, as monitored by LookOnChain, the Falcon Finance address received 10 million USD1.

item.title: Ethereum Rises Above $4600, 24-hour Gain 0.3%
item.description: On August 28th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum rebounded and exceeded $4600, with a 0.3% increase in price over the past 24 hours.

item.title: Binance Wallet Mitosis (MITO) Token TGE Point Threshold is 248 Points
item.description: August 28th, Binance made an announcement. It stated that the threshold for the TGE (Token Generation Event) of the Mitosis (MITO) token is 248 points. The Binance Wallet will commence the TGE of the Mitosis (MITO) token from 8:00 PM to 10:00 PM on August 28, 2025. And contract trading will open at 10:30 PM on the same day.

item.title: Hodling for 12 Years: Bitcoin OG Whale Deposits 250 BTC into Binance, Worth $28.29 Million
item.description: On August 28th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, the Bitcoin OG whale bc1qlf> has just made a deposit of 250 BTC into Binance, with a value of $28.29 million. This address still holds 3,000 BTC, which is worth $339 million.Twelve years ago, the whale acquired 5,000 BTC for only $332 (which was worth $1.66 million at that time), and only began selling in December 2024 after BTC exceeded $90,000.

item.title: Creditlink (CDL) Presale Officially Launches on Four.Meme
item.description: August 28th. Creditlink has officially commenced the CDL token presale on Four.Meme. The presale will be operational from August 28th, 2025, at 08:00 UTC until August 31st at 08:00 UTC. Early participants will have the chance to obtain an allocation in advance.Key Information:· Liquidity: The CDL liquidity pool will be accessible on both Aster DEX and PancakeSwap.· Trading: CDL will be listed for trading within 72 hours following the conclusion of the presale.Creditlink is an AI-powered on-chain identity verification and credit scoring platform.

item.title: The Ethena project's multisig address has deposited 15 million ENA into Binance, worth $9.64 million.
item.description: On August 28th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the dormant one-year Ethena project's multi-signature address 0x877...4bba6 deposited 15 million ENA coins into Binance 15 minutes ago. The value of these coins is $9.64 million.

item.title: An address sent 200 million PENGU tokens to Binance, worth $6.12 million.
item.description: August 28th. Based on EmberCN's monitoring, half an hour ago, an address transferred 200 million PENGU to Binance, with a value of $6.12 million. In the past 2 months, this address has continuously transferred 765 million PENGU to Binance at a high price range, worth $26.57 million, and the average transfer price is $0.035.

item.title: Four Federal Reserve Chair Candidates with Crypto-Friendly Stance, Final Candidate List to Be Determined in September
item.description: August 28th. The previous evening, U.S. Treasury Secretary Yellen declared that there are 11 prominent candidates for the position of the Federal Reserve Chair. The interviews will commence after Labor Day (which is on September 1st this year), and the final list will be submitted to President Trump. The known candidates on the list who are explicitly crypto-friendly comprise Investment Bank Jefferies' Chief Market Strategist David Zervos, BlackRock's Global Chief Investment Officer Rick Rieder, Fed official Bowman, and Fed Governor Waller.David Zervos and Rick Rieder have been engaged in activities related to cryptocurrency. This includes their recent public endorsements of the eToro trading platform, the stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Group, the crypto exchange Bullish, and the crypto-based lending firm Figure Technology Solutions. David Zervos also early on gave support to Michael Saylor's MicroStrategy Bitcoin purchase strategy.As the top regulatory official of the Fed, Bowm

item.title: Boros Updates Transaction Limit and Incentive Plan, Adds BTC and ETH Multi-Term Products
item.description: On August 28th, as per official information, Boros made an announcement regarding the addition of new trading pairs. It launched Binance contracts with an expiration date of December 26, 2025, for both BTCUSDT and ETHUSDT. In terms of fund parameters, the initial maximum leverage available is 2x. The OI Caps are set at $10 million for BTC and $15 million for ETH. The AMM Vault limits are $20,000 for BTC and $25,000 for ETH. As of now, all Vault limits have been filled. The team indicated that leverage and fund limits will be gradually adjusted based on market performance. Regarding incentive programs, the Maker Order and AMM position rewards for this week are as follows:- The Maker Order reward for the ETHUSDT (September 2025) contract is 1,150 PENDLE, and the AMM Vault is 190 PENDLE.- The Maker Order reward for the BTCUSDT (September 2025) contract is 750 PENDLE, and the AMM Vault is 190 PENDLE.- The Maker Order reward for the ETHUSDT (September 2025) contract is 1130 PENDLE, and t
